query: hello ek football ground kitna bada hota hai
response: Football ground ki size alag-alag ho sakta hai, lekin aam taur par ek standard ground lagbhag 100 se 110 meter lamba aur 64 se 75 meter chauda hota hai. Iska matlab hai ki ek football ground ek bade cricket field ke barabar ya thoda bada hota hai! Kya tumhe football khelna pasand hai?
